name: Maze to Hell
description:
You died, but heaven is overpopulated.
You gotta get to the end of the maze to get to heaven. Are you worthy to get there?

My first "wrapped up" game, so be gentle (?)

Controls: 
WASD to move
Mouse to look around.

Gamepad: 
Left stick to move
Right Stick to look around.

You can play with keyboard + mouse and with a gamepad (You'll need mouse in the menu, tho.)

To Exit, press ESC.
